description: Detects volume shadow copy mount Author: Roberto Rodriguez @Cyb3rWard0g, Open Threat Research (OTR). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate use of volume shadow copy mounts (backups maybe).
name: Volume Shadow Copy Mount
query: (winlog.channel:"System" AND Provider_Name:"Microsoft\-Windows\-Ntfs" AND winlog.event_id:"98" AND DeviceName:*HarddiskVolumeShadowCopy*)
